title: [Update: Global launch] Realme GT 2 Pro launches w/ Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, 120Hz LTPO display, more
content:
After teasing for the past few weeks, the Realme GT 2 Pro has launched in China as the firm’s most high-end flagship to date.

more…

The post [Update: Global launch] Realme GT 2 Pro launches w/ Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, 120Hz LTPO display, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After teasing for the past few weeks, the Realme GT 2 Pro has arrived in China as the firms most high-end flagship to date.
